thread.title: Go Steep and Deep in Retallack With Richie Schley
thread.title_full: Go Steep and Deep in Retallack With Richie Schley

title: Go Steep and Deep in Retallack With Richie Schley
text:
Go Steep and Deep in Retallack With Richie Schley Skid the scree of British Columbia's finest terrain with MTB legends Richie Schley and Aaron Chase. My POV: Richie Schley on Mine Tailing © Red Bull By Scott Hart on 10 January 2017 
Drop in with Mountain Bike Hall of Famer Richie Schley and fellow point-of-view video ace Aaron Chase into a mix of old-school freeride chutes and new-school rhythm sections of successive jumps and berms — creating a perfect modern-day blend of trail. 
"Mine Tailing" trail is just one of the gems found inside the world’s largest backcountry mountain biking operating area, Retallack Lodge, with over 1.5 million acres of high alpine terrain in Canada's interior of British Columbia. 
"Perfect flow, perfect jumps," says Schley of Mine Tailing's over 5,000 feet of vertical descent — accessible to any rider ready to get rowdy at Retallack . Watch the POV below 

Want more rad POV videos? Come back to RedBull.com/Bike every day this week to watch Schley and friends rip Canada's most amazing trails. 
• Tuesday (today): Steep and deep in Retallack (video above) 
• Wednesday: Whistler Bike Park's famed Dirt Merchant with Brian Lopes 
• Thursday: Inside Heavy Meadow high above Retallack Lodge with Geoff Gulevich 
• Friday: Bomb old-school freeride zones with Brett Tippie Related Stories
